conbody.p: The Eucalyptus Dashboard reports cloud resource usage over a user-specified date range. Three types of usage reports are available:

ul.li: Instance reports, which report the number of instances, the length of time each one has been running, and network and storage I/O usage for each
Storage reports, which report volume and snapshot storage space usage
S3 (Walrus) reports, which report the maximum number of buckets as well as storage space usage
